refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Applications can use the gnome_vfs_get_file_info family of operations to retrieve file information, as this operation can be quite costly in terms of time (specilly when sniffing the MIME type) applications can specify which information need at any time, reducing the performance impact.

All of these operations use a GnomeVFSFileInfo data structure that holds the file information, there are several methods that can be used to manipulate this information. See GnomeVFSFileInfo for more information.

refsect2.title: gnome_vfs_get_file_info ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve information about text_uri. The information will be stored in info.

listitem.simpara: URI of the file for which information will be retrieved
Pointer to a GnomeVFSFileInfo object that will hold the information for the file on return
Options for retrieving file information to retrieve for the file
An integer representing the result of the operation

refsect2.para: Retrieve information about text_uri. The information will be stored in info.

listitem.simpara: URI of the file for which information will be retrieved

refsect2.title: gnome_vfs_get_file_info_from_handle ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve information about an open file. The information will be stored in info.

listitem.simpara: Handle of the file for which information must be retrieved
Pointer to a GnomeVFSFileInfo object that will hold the information for the file on return
Options for retrieving file information to retrieve for the file
An integer representing the result of the operation

refsect2.title: gnome_vfs_set_file_info_uri ()
refsect2.para: Set file information for uri; only the information for which the corresponding bit in mask is set is actually modified.

listitem.simpara: A URI
Information that must be set for the file
Bit mask representing which fields of info need to be set
An integer representing the result of the operation.
